title: Backports for 1.12.2
body:
Backported PRs:
- [x] #59849 <!-- allow specifying projects in a workspace more than one level under it -->
- [x] #59873 <!-- update llvmcall docs, opaque pointers are now supported -->
- [x] #59878 <!-- fix accidental save (and restore) of sigmask when interpreting try -->
- [x] #59905 <!-- Fix: waitall can throw when all tasks are done -->
- [x] #59888 <!-- Type-assert `isfinite(::AbstractFloat)` -->
- [x] #59886 <!-- Type-assert `DataType.layout` in some Base functions -->
- [x] #59908 <!-- absint: allow ad-hoc cancellation of concrete evaluation -->
- [x] #59937 <!-- Names docstring: compat & implicit using -->
- [x] #59999 <!-- fix: TOML parsing of fractional seconds -->
- [x] #59974 <!-- inference: revisit all methods in cycle -->
- [x] #60006 <!-- REPL: make interactive precompiles test more robust -->
- [x] #60011 <!-- fix `pointerarith_tfunc` for Const ptr -->
- [x] #60023 <!-- Don't trigger full rebuild if git is dirty -->
- [x] #60030 <!-- fix waitall deadlock if any errors occur -->
- [x] #60055 <!-- fix string completion with cursor in the middle of text -->

Need manual backport:
- [ ] #59028 <!-- build: More msys2 fixes -->
- [ ] #59539 <!-- doc: HISTORY: single method for multiple functions -->
- [ ] #59917 <!-- Remove bitrotten debug-only code in 1.10 -->
- [ ] #59921 <!-- Set types of boxed variables in `abstract_eval_nonlinearized_foreigncall_name` -->
- [ ] #59991 <!-- cgutils: fix write barrier of atomic-setonce -->
- [x] #59932 <!-- Type-assert the return type of `collect(...)` in TOML -->
- [ ] #60041 <!-- MozillaCACerts: Update to 2025-11-04 -->

Contains multiple commits, manual intervention needed:
- [ ] #57143 <!-- Add JuliaLang/JuliaSyntax.jl#525 to NEWS.md, flisp parser, and REPL -->
- [ ] #58848 <!-- Set array size only when safe to do so -->
- [x] #60025 <!-- p7zip 17.7.0 -->

Non-merged PRs with backport label:
- [ ] #60073 <!-- Bump Documenter to 1.15.0 -->
- [ ] #60062 <!-- trimming: fix-up support for `Core._apply_iterate` -->
- [ ] #60061 <!-- allow finding stdlibs that are normal packages in the manifest but are now stdlibs -->
- [ ] #59998 <!-- Avoid hardcoding paths in Profile and Sys -->
- [ ] #59914 <!-- codegen: use direct value PHI for pointer-free aggregate types -->
- [ ] #59735 <!-- Extend backdating checks to imports and globals -->
- [ ] #59450 <!-- Propagate Addrspaces: fix lift of memset -->
- [ ] #58359 <!-- Use dwarf for symbol lookup if dladdr fails before doing linear search. -->
- [ ] #57422 <!-- Fix performance regression in hvcat of simple matrices -->
- [ ] #55601 <!-- inference: track reaching defs for slots -->
